price: àti àwọn tí wọ́n ń ṣe ohun wọ́n ń ṣe (nínú àwọn iṣẹ́ rere) pẹ̀lú ìbẹ̀rù nínú ọkàn wọn pé dájúdájú àwọn yóò padà sí ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa wọn;
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَواْ وَّقُلُوبُهُمۡ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yu'tūna mā ātaw waqulūbuhum wajilatun annahum ilā rabbihim rājiʿūna
